data.name: Typing of the Undead
data.detailed_description:
In a world filled with Zombies, the last survivor of a Spec Ops squad tries to survive,
and make his way through Hordes of Zombies to reach his final destination.



A beautifully crafted Typing game, with stylized graphics
Type as fast as you can and try to keep yourself alive for as much as possible.
Be fast and accurate with your typing to keep your combos high and increase your Highscore points
Learn how to type faster and polish your typing skills, while having fun, by killing zombies




40 different zombies to keep the game interesting
2 Bosses + 8 variations to make you lose your coolness ( more will be added soon )
Multiple languages for the UI ( English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Chinese, Greek )
Steam Achievements
Every wave is harder then the previous one.
Steam integrated - Keep your Score and Stats safe with your Steam profile.


:

Bosses ! More bosses on their way! Polish your skills from now to be ready.
Leader-boards
Steam Trading Cards
Campaign Mode ( Single Player )
WPM ( WordsPerMinute )

data.short_description: In a world filled with Zombies, the last survivor of a Spec Ops squad tries to survive, and make his way through Hordes of Zombies to reach his final destination.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Greek
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100 or equivalent
  • Graphics: GT 1030 2GB / RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12 or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Typing of the Undead Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 169₴ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 40₴.

highlighted.name: Home is, where the heart is

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content
